juzs.text: Those nie expect schodza us said len angels pod us my see our Lord (my potom verit!) Indeed they committed gross arrogance produced gross blasphemy
Dni they see angels nie bol dobry zvest guilty they say Teraz my irreversibly confined
My look o all robota they robi render them null i void
dwellers Raj bol daleko lepsie dni; they hear lepsie zvest
heaven zlomit apart masses z clouds angels zostupit multitudes
All sovereignty ze dni belongs do the Vela Gracious. For disbelievers it bol difficult dni
Dni pojdem when transgressor kusok jeho hands v anguish say Alas Ja zelat si ja nasledovat chodnicek posol
Alas woe mna Ja zelat si ja nie berie ze clovek znamy
He led mna away z odkaz it pojdem mna! Indeed devil lets jeho human victims
Posol said Moj Lord moj ludia zbehnut this Quran
My i set against kazdy prophet enemies z guilty Tvoj Lord suffices guide zvladnut
Those disbelieved said nie robit Quran pojdem him all o once My released it ona gradually v poradie fix it tvoj memory! My recited it specific sequence
Whatever argument they pod my zadovazit ona truth dobry chapat
Those kto forcibly zvolat do Hell som zly position they bol daleko na pravo chodnicek
My dat Moses scripture appointed jeho brat Aaron bol jeho assistant
My said Ist both z ona do ludia zamietnut our revelations subsequently my utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when ludia Noah disbelieved posol my drowned them my set them mat rad znamenie ludia! My chystat transgressors painful retribution
I â€˜Aad Thamoud inhabitants Al-Russ vela generations them
Do each z these zoskupit my delivered sufficient vzor before my annihilated them
They ist okolo obec je lejak s chudobny lejak (Sodom). they nie see it fact bol they never verit v vzkriesenie
When they saw ona they vzdy ridiculed ona this 1 zvolit si GOD Je bol posol
He skoro diverted us our gods nie bol my steadfastly persevered them. They will istota zalozit out, when they see retribution je real strayers z chodnicek
Ona seen jeden god Have bol jeho own ego? Ona bol jeho zastanca
Ona myslienka ze vela robit them hear chapat They bol iba zviera; ziaden they bol daleko zly
Ona nie seen ako tvoj Lord zamyslat shadow He willed He robit it fixed potom my zamyslat sun accordingly
My zamyslat it move slowly
He je Jeden zamyslat night bol zakryt a ona do spat zvysok. He robit dni vzkriesenie
He bol 1 kto sends zranit dobry omens Jeho zlutovanie my send nadol sky pure zavlazit
S it my revive dead zem zadovazit pne our creations! -multitudes z zviera humans
My distributed it them exact measure ze they berie heed Lenze vela ludia insist upon disbelieving
My willed my have sent do kazdy obec warner
Therefore nie obey disbelievers strive them this velka striving
He je Jeden merges 2 seas; 1 je fresh chutny chvila inaksie bol salty undrinkable. A He separated them formidable inviolable barrier (evaporation)
He je Jeden created z zavlazit human bol potom robit him reproduce manzelstvo mating Tvoj Lord bol Omnipotent
they still set GOD idols nie benefit them nor harm them! Indeed disbeliever bol enemy jeho Lord
My sent ona (Rashad) zachranca z dobry zvest i mat rad warner
Say ja nie ziadat ona any peniaze. All ja seek je pomoc ona zalozit na pravo chodnicek do tvoj Lord this bol co ona zvolit si
Ona put tvoj trust Jeden bol Alive -Jeden kto never umrel -Chvalit Him glorify Him! He bol fully Cognizant z Jeho creatures' zhresit
He je Jeden created heavens zem everything them 6 dni potom assumed all authority The Vela Gracious; ziadat about Him those lepsi founded znalost
When they told Jesen prostrate before the Vela Gracious they say Co bol the Vela Gracious? Shall my prostrate co ona zastanca? Thus it len zvacsit ich aversion
Zehnat je Jeden miesto constellations v the sky miesto it lampa ziara moon
He je Jeden zamyslat night dni alternate sufficient proof those zelat berie heed bol appreciative
worshipers the Vela Gracious som those tread zem gently when ignorant speak do them they len utter peace
Do privacy night they meditate ich Lord jesen prostrate
they say Our Lord rezervny us agony Hell; its retribution bol horrendous
It je chory abode; zly destiny
When they dat they bol neither extravagant nor lakomstvo; they dat moderation
They never implore GOD any inaksie god nor robit they kill ktokolvek -for GOD robit zivot sacred! -except v the course z justice Nor robit they commit adultery. Those commit these offenses zaplatit
Retribution zdvojnasobit them Dni Vzkriesenie they abide therein humiliated
Exempted som those repent verit lead righteous zivot! GOD transforms ICH ZHRESIT credits GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Those repent lead righteous zivot GOD redeems them; complete redemption
They nie bear false svedok. When they encounter vain talk they ignorovat it
When reminded z ich Lord's revelations they never react them mat rad they bol deaf blind
they say Our Lord let our spouses dieta bol zdroj radost us keep us forefront z the righteous
These je jeden attain Raj chrbat ich steadfastness; they received therein radostny pozdravy peace
Eternally they abide therein; co dobry destiny; co dobry abode
Say Ona attain value moj Lord len through tvoj kult! Ona disbelieve ona incur inevitable consequences
M. (Ta Seen Mim)
These (list) constitute proofs this clarifying scripture
Ona blame lenze they nie bol believers
My will my send sky znamenie forces ich krk bow
Whenever reminder z the Vela Gracious pod do them je new they turn aversion
Since they disbelieved they incurred consequences ich heedlessness
they nie seen zem a ako vela laskavy dobry zasadit my grown thereon
This bol sufficient proof them vela z them nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Recall tvoj Lord vola sa Moses Ist transgressing ludia
Pharaoh's ludia; perhaps they reform
He said Moj Lord ja fear lest they disbelieve mna
Ja lose moj temper Moj jazyk puto; send for moj brat Aaron
I they consider mna fugitive ja fear lest they kill mna
He nie said (they robit Ist Moj proofs My bol ona listening)
Ist Pharaoh say â€˜My bol posol Lord z universe
Let Dieta Izrael ist
He said my nie chov ona infancy ona spent vela rocnik us
Potom ona committed zlocin ona committed ona bol ungrateful
He said Indeed ja robit it when ja bol astray
Potom ja fled when ja feared ona moj Lord endowed mi s wisdom robit mi 1 posol
Ona chvastat sa lenze ona robit mna favor chvila zotrocit Dieta Izrael
Pharaoh said Co bol Lord universe
He said Lord z heavens zem everything them. Ona bol certain about this
He said do those around him ona hear this
He said Tvoj Lord Lord tvoj predok
He said Tvoj posol je sent do ona bol crazy
He said Lord z east zapad everything them ona chapat
He said ona accept any god mna ja throw ona zalar
He said Co ja show ona nieco profound
He said Potom produce it ona bol truthful
He potom threw jeho staff whereupon it became profound snake
he pocas jeho hand it bol biely do beholders
He said do elders him This bol zazitok kuzelnik
He chudoba berie ona tvoj zem jeho kuzlo. Co robit ona navrhovat
They said Respite him jeho brat send summoners kazdy town
Let them zvolat kazdy zazitok kuzelnik
Kuzelnik zozbierat appointed cas appointed dni
Ludia told Pojdem 1 all zozbierat dohromady tu
Maybe my nasledovat kuzelnik they bol winners
When kuzelnik pojdem they said do Pharaoh my zaplatit my Robit bol winners
He said Ano indeed; ona vecer bol mna
Moses said do them Throw co ona throw
They threw ich lano lepit sa said Pharaoh's majesty my bol victors
Moses threw jeho staff whereupon it lastovicka co they fabricated
Kuzelnik fell prostrate
They said My verit v Lord universe
Lord z Moses Aaron
He said Robi ona verit him before ja dat ona permission? He bol tvoj teacher taught ona kuzlo. Ona robit iste zalozit out! Ja sever tvoj hands nohy alternate strana. Ja crucify ona all
They said This nie zmenit our decision; our Lord my spatny listok
My hope our Lord forgive us our zhresit zvlast ze my bol prvy believers
My inspirovat Moses Cestovat Moj servants ona pursued
Pharaoh sent do mesto callers
(Proclaiming) This bol male gang
They ihned opposing us
all beware z them
Consequently my zbavit them z zahrada jaro
A treasures a honorable position
Potom my robit it inheritance Dieta Izrael
They pursued them east
When both parties saw each inak, Moses' ludia said My chytat
He nie said way Moj Lord bol mna; He guide mna
My potom inspirovat Moses Strike sea tvoj staff whereupon it parted Each part bol velky hill
My potom delivered them all
My thus saved Moses all those bol him
My drowned others
This bol sufficient proof vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Narrate do them Abraham's history
He said do jeho otca jeho ludia Co this ona je kult
They said My kult statues; my je totally devoted do them
He said they hear ona when ona implore
they benefit ona Mozem harm ona
They nie said my zalozit our rodicia robit this
He said Robit ona see these idols ona kult
Ona tvoj predok
Ja bol them for ja devoted len Lord universe
Jeden created mi guided mi
Jeden zivit mna zavlazit mna
A when ja get chorlavy He heals mna
Jeden puts mna smrt potom brings mna chrbat zivot
Jeden kto hopefully forgive moj zhresit Dni Judgment
Moj Lord grant mna wisdom zapocitat mna s the righteous
Let vzor ja set for the dalej generations bol dobre
Robit mna 1 inheritors blissful Raj
A forgive moj otca for he ist astray
Nie forsake mi Dni Vzkriesenie
Ze je dni when neither peniaze nor dieta pomoc
Len those pojdem GOD ich whole srdce will saved
Raj presented the righteous
Hell set strayers
They ziadat Kde bol idols ona kult
beside GOD they pomoc ona ihned? they pomoc
They thrown therein dohromady strayers
all z Satan's vojak
They say mat rad they feud therein
By GOD my bol daleko astray
Ako my set ona could rank Lord universe
Those zmylit us bol zlomyselny
Teraz my nie have intercessors
Nor single koniec znamy
Len my get iny chance my potom verit
This bol dobry lekcia. Vela ludia nie bol believers
Tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Ludia Noah disbelieved posol
Ich brat Noah said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona any wage Moj wage pod z Lord universe
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
They said Ako my verit ona mozem when zly among us nasledovat ona
He said Ako ja zauzlit co they robit robit
Ich judgment zvysok len moj Lord ona zbadat
Ja never vypustit z hlavy believers
Ja bol ziaden inak than clarifying warner
They said ona zdrzat sa O Noah ona stoned
He said Moj Lord moj ludia disbelieved mna
Grant mna victory them deliver mi moj podnik believers
My delivered him those sprevadzat him loaded ark
Potom my drowned others
This bol lekcia vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
â€˜Aad disbelieved posol
Ich brat Hood said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona for any wage moj wage pod z Lord universe
Ona build kazdy hill rezidencia vanity's sake
Ona set buildings ona posledny forever
A when ona strike ona strike mercilessly
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Reverence Jeden zadovazit ona all things ona zauzlit
He zadovazit ona zivy inventar dieta
A zahrada a jaro
Ja fear for ona retribution awesome dni
They said bol the same ona preach nie preach
Ze affliction limited our predok
Ziaden retribution vzdy befall us
They thus disbelieved consequently my annihilated them. This bol lekcia vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Thamoud disbelieved posol
Ich brat Saaleh said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona any wage moj wage pojdem len Lord universe
Ona suppose ona lavy forever zabezpecit v this statny
Ona enjoy zahrada jaro
zozat datum palms lahodny ovocie
Ona carve mountains luxurious rezidencia
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Nie obey transgressors
Kto commit zly nie dobry robota
They said Ona bewitched
Ona bol ziaden inak than human us. Produce zazrak if ona bol truthful
He said Tu je camel pne len dni assigned ju; dni je inak tvoj specified dni z pne
Robi nie touch ju any harm lest ona incur retribution awesome dni
They slaughtered ju thus incurred zalost
retribution overwhelmed them. This bol lekcia vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Ludia Lot disbelieved posol
Ich brat Lot said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona any wage moj wage pojdem len Lord universe
Robi ona have rod muzsky all ludia
Ona forsake manzelka tvoj Lord created ona! Indeed ona transgressing ludia
They said ona zdrzat sa O Lot ona banished
He said ja deplore tvoj cin
Moj Lord save mi moj rodina z ich robota
My saved him all jeho rodina
Nie stara zensky; ona doomed
My potom znicit others
My lejak them chudobny lejak; co hrozny lejak those warned
This bol lekcia vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
Ludia Les disbelieved posol
Shu aib said do them ona nie bol righteous
Ja bol honest posol ona
Ona reverence GOD obey mna
Ja nie ziadat ona any wage moj wage pojdem len Lord universe
Ona dat full measure when ona zivnost; robit nie cheat
Ona weigh equitable scale
Nie cheat ludia ich na pravo nie roam zem corruptingly
Reverence Jeden created ona previous generations
They said Ona bewitched
Ona bol ziaden inak than human bol us. Skutocne my myslienka ona bol liar
Let masses sky jesen us ona bol truthful
He said Moj Lord je Jeden zauzlit everything ona robit
They disbelieved him consequently they incurred retribution Dni Canopy It bol retribution awesome dni
This bol lekcia vela ludia nie bol believers
vela assuredly tvoj Lord bol Almighty Merciful
This bol revelation Lord universe
Honest Spirit (Gabriel) pod it
Do reveal it into tvoj srdce ze ona bol 1 z warners
Do zdokonalit Arabic jazyk
It prophesied rezervovat si previous generations
it nie sufficient je znamenie them ze it bol zauzlit do scholars Dieta Izrael
My revealed this ludia nie zauzlit Arabic
had him recite it Arabic they possibly nie verit v it
My thus render it (zaluba zahranicny language) srdce guilty
Thus they nie verit v it nie until they see painful retribution
It pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it
They potom say my have respite
they nie challenge our retribution
mat rad ona see my allowed them enjoy for rocnik
Potom retribution pojdem them iba mat rad promised
Ich vast resources nie pomoc them v the maly
My never annihilate any obec without sending warners
Therefore this bol reminder my bol never unjust
devils never reveal this
They neither would nor could
they je zamedzit z hearing
Therefore nie idolize GOD any inaksie god lest ona incur retribution
Ona preach ludia bol koniec do ona
znizenie tvoj kulisy believers nasledovat ona
they disobey ona potom say ja disown co ona robit
put tvoj trust do Almighty Merciful
Kto sees ona when ona meditate night
Tvoj frequent prostrations
He bol Hearer Omniscient
Ja informovat ona upon koho devils zostupit
They zostupit kazdy guilty fabricator
They pretend listen vela z them bol liars
Mat rad for poets they nasledovat iba strayers
Ona nie see ich loyalty shifts situation
A ze they say co they nie robit
Exempted som those verit lead righteous zivot commemorate GOD frequently stand ich na pravo! Iste transgressors robit zalozit out co ich ultimate destiny bol
These (list) constitute proofs Quran; profound scripture
beacon dobry zvest believers
Kto observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) they som zretel Hereafter absolutely certain
Those nie verit v Hereafter my zdobit ich robota ich oci. Thus they zotrvat omyl
bol these incur chory retribution Hereafter they je zly losers
Iste ona receiving Quran z Wise Omniscient
Recall lenze Moses said do jeho rodina ja see zapalit; let mna bring ona zvest therefrom torch zohriat ona
When he pojdem it he bol vola sa Zehnat je Jeden speaking zapalit those around it Glory bol GOD Lord universe
O Moses this bol Mna GOD Almighty Wise
Throw nadol tvoj staff When he saw it moving mat rad demon he turned around fled O Moses nie bol afraid. Moj posol nie fear
those kto commit transgression potom zastupid righteousness after zhresit; ja Forgiving Merciful
Put tvoj hand v tvoj pocket it pod biely blemish These som 9 zazrak do Pharaoh jeho ludia for they bol zlomyselny ludia
When our zazrak presented them zretelny profound they said This bol obviously kuzlo
They zamietnut them utterly convinced z ich zlo ways ich arrogance. Note consequences evildoers
My endowed David Solomon znalost they said Chvalit GOD for zehnat us inak than vela z Jeho verit servants
Solomon bol David's heir He said O ludia my endowed s chapat language birds all laskavy z things bestowed us. This bol indeed real zehnat
Mobilized servis Solomon bol jeho obedient vojak z jinns humans i mat rad birds; all do jeho disposal
When they zblizit sa valley ants 1 ant said O ona ants ist into tvoj domov lest ona get crushed Solomon jeho vojak without zbadat

He smiled laughed ju statement said Moj Lord riadit mna bol appreciative z blessings Ona bestowed mi moj rodicia robit righteous robota prosim Ona! Admit mna Tvoj zlutovanie podnik Tvoj righteous servants
He inspected birds noted ja nie see hoopoe? Why he zameskat
Ja punish him severely sacrifice him he dat mna dobry excuse
He nie cakat long (hoopoe) said ja have zvest ze ona nie have Ja brought ona Sheba some dolezity informacia
Ja zalozit zensky ruling them zehnat everything possesses tremendous palace
Ja zalozit ju ju ludia prostrating sun GOD devil zdobit ich robota ich oci repulsed them chodnicek; consequently they nie guided
They prostrating GOD Jeden manifests all zahada heavens zem 1 kto zauzlit everything ona zatajit everything ona declare
GOD there NIE bol INAK god Him Lord velky dominion
(Solomon) said My see ona told truth al ona bol liar
Berie this list mna dat it them potom watch ich response
Ona said O moj advisers ja received honorable list
bol Solomon it bol GOD Gracious Merciful
Proclaiming â€˜Robit arrogant pojdem mna mat rad submitters
Ona said O moj advisers counsel mna v this zalezitost! Ja nie deciding anything ona radit mi
They said My possess power my possess boj zrucnost ultimate command bol tvoj hand Ona decide co robit
Ona said kings zhnity any zem they invade subjugate its dignified ludia! This bol co they usually robit
Ja sending darcekove predmety them; see co posol pod s

When hoopoe spatny listok Solomon (he told him zvest he responded Sheba's zaludnit ona dat mna peniaze? Co GOD dat mna bol daleko lepsie than co He dat ona. Ona bol jeden rejoice such darcekove predmety)
(Do hoopoe he said Ist them let them zauzlit lenze) my pojdem them forces they nie imagine My evict them humiliated debased
He said O ona elders z ona bring mna ju rezidencia before they arrive tu submitters
afrit z jinns said ja bring it ona ona stand Ja bol mocny enough robit this

Jeden possessed znalost rezervovat si said ja bring it ona zmurkat tvoj oci. When he saw it zaplatit him he said This bol zehnat moj Lord whereby He tests mna show ja bol appreciative unappreciative. Whoever bol appreciative je appreciative jeho own dobry a if jeden turns unappreciative potom moj Lord bol do ziaden need him Honorable
He said Remodel ju rezidencia ju. see ona guided zotrvat s the misguided
When ona arrived ona ziadat Robit tvoj rezidencia look this? Ona said zdanlivy this bol it (Solomon said My zauzlit beforehand co ona robi my bol already submitters)
Ona diverted kult idols GOD ona belonged do disbelieving ludia

(Ona told Ist palace. When ona saw its interier ona myslienka bol pool zavlazit ona tahat ju saty) exposing ju noha! He said This interier ihned paved s crystal Ona said Moj Lord ja zlo moj soul. Ja ihned submit Solomon GOD Lord universe
My have sent do Thamoud ich brat Saaleh saying Ona kult GOD they turned into 2 feuding factions
He said O moj ludia ona hasten robit commit zly dobry robota? Len ona implore GOD forgiveness ona attain zlutovanie
They said My consider ona zly omen us ona those joined ona. He said Tvoj omen fully controlled GOD Indeed ona bol deviant ludia
There bol 9 gangsters mesto bol zlomyselny never robi anything dobry
They said swear GOD my kill him jeho ludia potom tell jeho tribe â€˜My zauzlit nothing ich smrt! My bol truthful
They zapletka kut plany my i zapletka kut plany chvila they nie zbadat
Note consequences ich zapletka my annihilated them all ich ludia
Tu som ich domov utterly zahuba ich transgression! This bol lekcia ludia zauzlit
My save those verit lead righteous zivot
Lot said do jeho ludia Ako ona commit such abomination publicly chvila ona see
Ona practice rod clovek lustfully zensky! Indeed ona bol ignorant ludia
